defined_class_name: anterior-posterior axis of the whole animal
defined_class_definition: Axis that runs along the long axis of the animal from anterior (head) to posterior (tail). It is perpendicular to the dorsoventral axis and as such, it splits dorsal and ventral regions of the animal to either side.
exact_syn: anterior-posterior axis | main body axis | longitudinal axis | body axis
image_comment: Depiction shows an asexual adult with the term annotated in yellow. Scale bar =500um

defined_class_name: dorsal-ventral axis of the whole animal
defined_class_definition: Axis that runs along the short axis of the animal, perpendicular to the anteroposterior axis, running from the dorsal (back) side of the animal to the ventral (belly) side of the animal. This axis splits anterior and posterior regions of the animal to either side.

defined_class_name: sagittal plane of the whole animal
defined_class_definition: Anatomical plane which divides the body into right and left parts. This plane passes through the midline at the midline but does not always the midline.
image_comment: Illustration of a sagittal plane of the whole animal (in green).

defined_class_name: oral-aboral axis of the embryo
defined_class_definition: Axis that runs from the oral pole and to the aboral pole of the spherical embryo (Stage 3 through early Stage 6). The oral pole is centered around the embryonic pharynx; the aboral pole is located opposite the embryonic pharynx.
image_comment: Illustration noting the oral-aboral axis in cyan double headed arrow.  It starts at the embryonic pharynx and extends to opposite pole.

defined_class_name: left-right axis of the whole animal
defined_class_definition: Axis perpendicular to both the anteroposterior and dorsoventral axis that runs from the left side of the animal, through the medial region (center) and out to the right side.
image_comment: Depiction shows an asexual adult with the term annotated in yellow. Scale bar =500um

defined_class_name: medial-lateral axis of the whole animal
defined_class_definition: Axis that runs from the center of the body, starting at the anteroposterior axis and out to the lateral (left, right, dorsal or ventral) surface of the animal.
exact_syn: medial-lateral axis | mediolateral  | mediolateral | mediolateral axis
image_comment: Depiction shows an asexual adult with the term annotated in yellow. Scale bar =500um

defined_class_name: proximal-distal axis of the whole animal
defined_class_definition: Axis that starts at the distal part of an appendage, closest to the body, and runs to the proximal part of an appendage, farthest from the body.
image_comment: Pharynx of an asexual adult exposed by tricaine treatment. The proximodistal axis is denoted with the double headed magenta arrow.

defined_class_name: basal surface of the epidermis
defined_class_definition: The basal surface of the epidermis in direct contact with the basal lamina.
image_comment: Electron micrograph of the dorsal epidermis in a transverse plane. The basal epidermis surface is noted with magenta arrows. Scale bar is 5um.

defined_class_name: apical surface of the epidermis
defined_class_definition: The apical surface of the single layered epidermis that is in contact with the environment.
image_comment: Electron micrograph of the dorsal epidermis in a transverse plane from an asexual adult animal. The apical epidermis surface is noted with magenta arrows. Scale bar is 5um.

defined_class_name: anterior region of the whole animal
defined_class_definition: Compartment along the anteroposterior axis closer to the head rather than the tail, from the head margin to the esophagus.
image_comment: Illustration of the anterior region of the whole animal (in green).

defined_class_name: dorsal region of the whole animal
defined_class_definition: Three dimensional compartment along the dorsoventral axis that is above the anteroposterior axis, containing the eyes.
image_comment: Illustration of the dorsal region of the whole animal (in green).

defined_class_name: dorsal region of the epidermis
defined_class_definition: Single cell layer of dorsal, post-mitotic, epithelial cells containing the dorsal stripe.
image_comment: Image is an electron micrograph depicting the dorsal epidermis (arrowheads). Also visible in this micrograph, immediately deep to the epidermis is the basal lamina and beneath that is a photoreceptor. Scale bar is 10 um.

defined_class_name: dorsal midline
defined_class_definition: The median line/plane of bilateral symmetry along the anteroposterior axis on the dorsal surface of the animal.
image_comment: Illustration of the dorsal midline (in green).

defined_class_name: ventral midline
defined_class_definition: The median line/ plane of bilateral symmetry along the anteroposterior axis on the ventral surface of the animal.
image_comment: Illustration of the ventral midline (in green).

defined_class_name: posterior region of the whole animal
defined_class_definition: Three dimensional compartment along the anteroposterior axis that is closer to the tail rather than the head, from the anterior boundary of the pharyngeal pouch to the tip of the tail.
exact_syn: posterior compartment of the whole animal
image_comment: Illustration of the posterior compartement of the whole animal (in green).

defined_class_name: ventral region of the whole animal
defined_class_definition: Compartment along the dorsoventral axis that is below the anteroposterior axis.
image_comment: Illustration of the ventral region of the whole animal (in green).

defined_class_name: ventral epidermis
defined_class_definition: Single cell layer of ventral, post-mitotic, heavily ciliated epithelial cells
exact_syn: cilated ventral epidermis|ciliated ventral epithelium|ventral epithelia|ventral epithelium | ventral epidermin

defined_class_name: dorsal ventral margin of the whole animal
defined_class_definition: Region along the edge of the animal where the dorsal and ventral surfaces meet.
exact_syn: dorsoventral margin | edge | D/V boundary|DV border|DV boundary|DV domain|DV margin|body edge|body margin|body periphery|dorsal ventral boundary|dorsal-ventral boundary

defined_class_name: dorsal region of tail
defined_class_definition: The dorsal region of the tail.
image_comment: Illustration of the dorsal region of the tail (in green).

defined_class_name: lateral region of the whole animal
defined_class_definition: The lateral region of the medio-lateral axis of the whole animal.

defined_class_name: anterior region of the eye
defined_class_definition: The anterior region of the eye.

defined_class_name: posterior region of the eye
defined_class_definition: The posterior region of the eye.

defined_class_name: prepharyngeal midline
defined_class_definition: The center-most region just anterior to the pharynx
